document_data.name: Ilphemon
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Ilphemon''' was an Imaskari nobleman. After the fall of the Empire, he founded the city of Deep Imaskar, which his successors ruled for nearly two thousand years.
document_data.History:
In the year [[-2488 DR]], Lord Ilphemon fled to an uncharted corner of the [[Underdark]] with a small group of retainers and family.<ref> These Imaskari refugees fled in {{yearlink|-2487}} to the Underdark, taking the ''[[Third Imaskarcana]]'' with them; in [[-2481 DR]], Lord Ilphemon would found the city of [[Deep Imaskar]] in the [[Earthroot]] area of the Underdark. He commissioned a written story of the Imaskar at some point, which would be kept in the Purple Library of Deep Imaskar.<ref>

His descendants would rule Deep Imaskar until [[-634 DR]] when a cabal of necromancers overthrew them.<ref>
